item.title: Integration server sided- New
item.dc:creator: @nathanz nathanz
item.description:
@nathanz wrote:

I’m following this guide:

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/525999-hyperion-forum-server-account-integration.html

For some reason it just outprints the password 3 times and then says " no response from login server ".

// Check username fi.checkUsername(this); if (fi.tempURC == 10) { // Just continue and do nothing } else if (fi.tempURC == 11) { setReturnCode(Constants.ACCOUNT_NOT_CREATED); return false; }

// Check pass fi.checkUser(this); if (fi.tempPRC == 1 || fi.tempPRC == 2 || fi.tempPRC == 3 || fi.tempPRC == 4) { setReturnCode(Constants.LOGIN_RESPONSE_OK); return true; } else if (fi.tempPRC == 0) { setReturnCode(Constants.LOGIN_RESPONSE_INVALID_CREDENTIALS); return false; }

Any help is highly appreciated. Add my skype if you need: mrzeus6

Read full topic
